dataList.name: Reminisced Augmentation
dataList.desc: Turn Start: At less than 50% HP, heal 20% HP

dataList.name: Hora de Fiesta
dataList.desc: Turn Start: at less than 50% HP, gain 1 [Enhancement] and 1 [Endurance]

dataList.name: Blue Resin
dataList.desc: When an Eye Part breaks, the enemy with the least SP loses 35 SP

dataList.name: Noble be Thy Sacrifice
dataList.desc: When an ally dies, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn

dataList.name: Joy of Execution
dataList.desc: On Kill, gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn

dataList.name: Thou Shalt Hammer
dataList.desc: Turn Start: If this unit has [Assemble], gain 5 [AttackDmgUp]

dataList.name: Lightning Rod
dataList.desc:
When the Telephone Pole is hit, inflict 2 [ElectricShock] on the attacker this turn.
At 5+ [DogThunder], all Parts will inflict 3 [ElectricShock] on the attacker, starting next turn.
(Lasts until [DogThunder] reaches 0.)
When hit by a Sloth attack, the amount of [ElectricShock] inflicted is halved. (rounded up)

dataList.name: Lightning
dataList.desc:
While the Telephone Pole isn’t broken, gain 1 [DogThunder] after an attack
Whenever the Telephone Pole is hit by an attack, lose 1 [DogThunder]

dataList.name: Breaking Pieces
dataList.desc:
When the telephone pole is Staggered or Broken, lose all [DogThunder];
All Attack Skills of the Alleyway Watchdog will then be canceled for the turn

dataList.name: Initiating Town Tour
dataList.desc: Turn Start: At 10+ [Charge] Count, gain a new pattern

dataList.name: Damage Detected!
dataList.desc: On death, kqe-1j-23 takes 100 damage, becomes Staggered next turn, and is prohibited from using all Skills that inflict [Duress] for the rest of the Encounter

dataList.name: Blood Sac
dataList.desc:
If this unit has [BloodPocket]:
- The Body's Wrath Resist. -50%
- The Body's Gloom Resist. +50%

dataList.name: Fluid Sac
dataList.desc: If this unit has [WaterPocket], heal its Core by (Stack x 20)

dataList.name: Pulsating Arms
dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain [Enhancement] and [Protection] by [AggressiveBokgak] Stack

dataList.name: Damaged Arms
dataList.desc: Lose 1 [AggressiveBokgak] whenever this unit takes 1+ damage from attacks

dataList.name: Regenerating Shell
dataList.desc: Turn End: if the unit didn’t take any damage from attacks during the turn, heal 5% HP and gain 1 [AggressiveBokgak]

dataList.name: Frantic Eyes
dataList.desc:
Behavior depends on the [AggressiveBokgak] Stack.
Uses aggressive Skills at 4+ [AggressiveBokgak], and becomes defensive at less than 4

dataList.name: HP Bullets
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: heal 15 HP
At less than 50% HP, heal 15 additional HP

dataList.name: Overloaded HP Bullet
dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain 2 [Protection] and 2 [Vulnerable]

dataList.name: HP Ampule Injection
dataList.desc: Turn Start: if this unit's HP is not at full, heal 25% HP (3 times max)

dataList.name: Amplified Aggression
dataList.desc:
When hit, gain 1 [AggressiveBokgak]
Turn End: At 4+ [AggressiveBokgak], enter [Enrage] state

dataList.name: Frenzy
dataList.desc: In the [Enrage] state, gain 3 [Enhancement] and 3 [Vulnerable], gain a new Skill pattern, and does not gain [AggressiveBokgak] when hit

dataList.name: Shimmering Rage
dataList.desc: At less than 50% HP, enters [Enrage] every turn

dataList.name: Rotting Skin
dataList.desc: Turn Start: At less than 50% HP, when hit, inflict 3 [Poison] against the attacker

dataList.name: Molt
dataList.desc:
After this Part is broken, if the other Arm is not broken at the end of the following turn, this Part regenerates with the same HP as the other Arm; then, heal the Core by the amount of the regenerated Arm's HP

When both Arms are broken, gain a new Skill pattern

dataList.name: Pained Writhing
dataList.desc: Gain 5 [Vulnerable] and inflict 10 [Poison] against all enemies every turn

dataList.name: Wriggling Instincts
dataList.desc:
Behavior depends on the [AggressiveBokgak] Stack.
Uses aggressive Skills at 4+ [AggressiveBokgak] Stack, and becomes defensive at 0

dataList.name: Overflowing Ecstasy
dataList.desc: Starting from turn 3, become [Cromer_Ecstasy] every 2 turns

dataList.name: Blooming Purity
dataList.desc: Turn End: If Kromer’s main body is brought to less than 50% HP, she gains [Cromer_Madness] for the remaining turns

dataList.name: Flawless Flesh
dataList.desc: When the Arm is broken, the Part gains 2 [Reduction]

dataList.name: Dhyāna
dataList.desc: If there are surviving allies, gain 10 [Protection] at every Turn Start

dataList.name: Cyclical Karma
dataList.desc:
All units transfer 10 of their [Cycle] to their targets On Hit
([Cycle] Stack transferred increases by 5 per Clash count)
[Cycle] is not transferred to My Form Empties as long as its allies are alive

dataList.name: Anatman
dataList.desc: Turn Start: if the Mūrti is broken, apply 30 [Cycle] and 3 [Vulnerable] to a random other ally, gain a new Skill pattern, and enter an Indiscriminate mode of Anatman (Non-Self).

dataList.name: Nirmāna
dataList.desc: Whenever the Mūrti recovers, its Max HP increases by 20%.

dataList.name: Bhaishajya
dataList.desc: Turn Start: fully heal HP
